page.title: 02Traffic Survey.
page.content:
Some boys from 1G1 compiled a traffic survey to see how many vehicles went in and out of Stratton Crossroads.
This survey lasted two hours and we had two people at each station.There were 6 stations for vehicles entering and 6 for leaving.When we got back to class we found that if we added the totals together we found that they were almost the same allowing for cars which parked or entered Headlands School.
We found that nearly 1500 vehicles used the junction between 10am and 11am and nearly 2000 vehicles between 11am and 12 noon.
This is the busiest junction in North Swindon.
